statements: DELETE FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE completed = true
DELETE FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE investment_id = 101 AND completed = FALSE
DELETE FROM investments WHERE investment_amount < 10000 AND investment_type = 'Stock';
DELETE FROM profits WHERE investment_id = 101 AND profit_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdraw' AND transaction_amount < 1000;

DELETE FROM investments WHERE investor_name = 'John Smith';
